crystalWarehouse.name: Warehouse of Crystal

rewards.message:
{Warehouse of Crystal}

The owner of the storage makes haste to tell you: 'My Lord, I`ve gathered all crystals from the nearby production points for you. Come next week for the new portion!'

crystalWarehouse.onEmptyMessage:
{Warehouse of Crystal}

The owner of the storage is apologising: 'I am sorry Milord, no crystal here. Please, return next week!'
